beans.services

Class DataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • beans.services.DataService

  • @Named
 @ApplicationScoped
public class DataService
extends java.lang.Object
    A Class that prepares the data for inserting into the database as well as generating the 'create table' statement with information gathering from the JSON string in the incoming messages.
